author: Mark Wilson
title: This Covid-19 tracking app lets you help scientists study the coronavirus
description: A new Covid-19 symptom logging app is here to help scientists track the coronavirus – even if you don't have symptoms.
content:
If you'd like to feel that you're doing more in the battle against the coronavirus than self-isolating with Animal Crossing, then it's worth checking out the new Covid-19 tracking app aimed at helping scientists track the disease.
